chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸 croaked, "Chirp, chirp! 10 PM! Medicine time!" Little Pip, a fluffy chick 🐥, usually obeyed. One night, engrossed in building a tower of corn kernels 🌽, Pip forgot. Ferdinand, seeing Pip’s blissful ignorance, hopped over and *bopped* him with a lily pad! 🌿 Pip, startled, finally remembered. "Oh! Right! Thanks, Ferdie!" Pip chirped, gulping down the yucky goo. 🤢 Ferdinand winked. 😉 "Ribbit. Doctor's orders, kid."
